00088     void set(const KeySpec &key, const char *value) {
00089       if (value)
00090         set(key, value, strlen(value));
00091       else
00092         set(key, 0, 0);
00093     }

00098     void set(const KeySpec &key, const String &value) {
00099       set(key, value.data(), value.length());
00100     }

00157       if (m_prev_buffer)
00158         m_prev_buffer->get_failed_mutations(failed_mutations);

00169     virtual bool need_retry() {
00170       if (m_prev_buffer)
00171         return m_prev_buffer->get_failure_count() > 0;
00172       return false;
00173     }
